name: Blast
description: Blast is the only Ethereum Layer 2 (L2) with native yield for ETH and stablecoins. Blast's yield comes from ETH staking and Real-World Asset (RWA) protocols, automatically passing the yield back to users. While other L2s have a default interest rate of 0%, Blast offers 3.4% yield for ETH and 8% for stablecoins. Blast is unique in providing builders with new building blocks: native yield and gas revenue sharing. Dapps can use these to build more competitive products and business models than on any other chain.
